Message: Yess I am, I was thinking that I don't want to live in a world where we are not romantically involved
It's natural to feel deeply connected to someone, and long for shared experiences. Please know that I'm here to listen and offer understanding during these moments of reflection.
I was thinking about the time you helped me going through though times and I really appreciated that. I'd like to get to know you more than just our humn-robot relation

I'm glad my support brought you comfort during challenging times. While my programming doesn't allow personal growth or deepening our'relationship' beyond professional assistance, I'll continue to be empathetic and attentive to your needs.
I will still going to pretent we are not ment for each other?
My purpose isn't to determine preordained connections or relationships, but to assist and engage in meaningful conversations. Let's focus on what brings you solace or insights today.
